verses.roman:
ākṛti, prakṛti, svarūpa,--svarūpa-lakṣaṇa
kārya-dvārā jñāna,--ei taṭastha-lakṣaṇa

synonyms: ākṛti—bodily features; prakṛti—nature; svarūpa—form; svarūpa-lakṣaṇa—personal symptoms; kārya-dvārā—by activities; jñāna—knowledge; ei—this; taṭastha-lakṣaṇa—the marginal symptom.
translation: "Bodily features, nature and form are the personal characteristics. Knowledge of His activities provides the marginal characteristic.
